content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the decision identified as p 5562019i was made on june 10 2021 the defendant in the case has been awarded costs of 780479 eur which the plaintiff is responsible for paying the legal procedure lasted for 2 years 2 months and 10 days starting on march 21 2019 and ending on june 10 2021 the final resolution of the lawsuit determined that the total value of the goods involved was 200000 eur the division of the goods was determined between the exspouses with the plaintiff receiving 40 and the defendant receiving 60 the specific laws used in the decision are listed as family code sections 61 67 68 73 74 77 82 and 84 the case involves a plaintiff and a defendant regarding the establishment of shares in a coowned property worth 200000 eur there is also a counterclaim by the plaintiff against the defendant for 6025534 eur related to the establishment of shares and a payment issue after a main hearing the court made several rulings including allowing an amendment to the counterclaim declaring the shares of the litigants as 40 for the plaintiff and 60 for the defendant and ordering the plaintiff to pay various amounts with interest to the client the court dismissed the plaintiffs claims regarding joint property and payment as well as the claimants claims regarding the counterclaim and possession of certain assets the applicant defendant was ordered to reimburse the defendants legal costs the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the time limit required documents and payment of court fees the summary concludes by stating that the text is dated as of june 10 2021 in ljubljana
